about_the_game:
Filthy Animals | Heist Simulator - Official OST

Step into the world of the Filthy Animals: Heist Simulator and groove to the beats of the Original Soundtrack!

Immerse yourself in the infectious rhythms, catchy melodies, and diverse genres that make up this diverse soundtrack. From the nostalgic vibes of 90s hip-hop to the groovy 80s funk and reggae influences, every track is made to captivate and elevate your puny mutant senses.

Vibe to the dope jams crafted by Cosmic (Bren Sutton), artist and Filthy Animals game developer. With 12 original songs, the soundtrack perfectly complements the gameplay and aesthetics of Filthy Animals.

Grab your copy today and let the beats take you on a journey yuh won't fawhget, alright?

Written & Produced by Cosmic
